sense.name: the quotient of two numbers, a non-whole numeric value
sense.examples: The children are learning fractions this week in their math class. Adding the fractions 1/4 and 1/3 results in 7/12. You can also write 25/1000 as the decimal fraction .025.

sense.name: a small, indefinite portion of something
sense.examples: They are not one fraction closer to a settlement than they were before. This flooring material costs a fraction of what that Italian marble would cost. It was just a fraction of an inch too short. (the specific fraction is not identified, so not sense 1)

sense.name: a component of a chemical mixture separated out by fractionation
sense.examples: Alcohol is one of the fractions in this blue liquid. This process will separate the material into its four chemical fractions.
